name: Refuge: Chapter One
description:
Refuge follows Claudia, a woman in her late teens or early twenties, who has lived in her father’s compound, an impenetrable fortress designed to be separate from the rest of society and from the surrounding ecosystem. She’s had very little human interaction outside of her father and her older sister, Liz. When Liz runs away, escaping the compound, Claudia is compelled to follow. Though they’ve been on rough terms for the past few years, Claudia decides she must track down her sister and bring her home.

**part of the interactivity with the early Kitchen/Fields scenes had to be cut for buggy variables that messed with the playability of the overall game for my playtesters. these scenes will be re-added as soon as I determine the reason for the issue. -TR**
